titleStmt.title: A. D. Kennedy et al. to Unknown
CWG2282

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Appointments by the Governor, Civil Appointments, 1863-1867

body.p:
A. D. Kennedy Esq,
Judge Logan County Court.}
Russellville, Kentucky.
November 6th 1865.

We the undersigned Citizens of Logan County, Ky. wish to recommend for your favorable consideration, Nelson C. Lawrence (late Major 17th Ky. Cavalry) for the Office of Justice Peace of Logan County in the Russellville District, in place of G. W. Herr resigned --

Yours Respectfully,
A. D. Kennedy Judge Logan County Court
G. Z. Blakey Sheriff Logan Co. Ky.
Elias Porter Post Master, Russellville, Ky.
S F Johnson Late Col. 17th Ky., Cavalry.

R. G. Thomas
Wm Gaston
J, E, Ayres
C. Barker
J. M. Barker
Thos Hardy
Jos R. Aingell
W W Fallin
H B Tully
J A L Boyer
F" M" Page
T. A. Frazer
